name: Brotherhood Of Steel Fist
description:
Attention! This game made in 1 day! Please do not forget it when you play, thanks ^^

   Once upon a time, there was a land, full with peace but it isn't going to be long...

Creatures named Cromathis came out from dark lands and they have begun to attack Brotherhood of Steel Fist.

There was a huge war and lost. As time goes on, Cromathises finally retreaded. Until this day, Brotherhood named this lands as Raven's Bitter Smile. Brotherhood knows that they will come again. They need to improve themselves...
